name: GameBoy Collection
description:
GameBoy Collection is a collection of little games made for GBJAM8!

Games:
  • Minesweeper     (A: Action / B: Flag / Start: Exit game)
  • Space Invaders   (A: Shoot / Start: Exit game)
  • Pong (2 Players) (Arrows and WASD: Move / Start: Exit game)
Controls First Player:
  • Arrows  -> GameBoy D-Pad: Move
  • 1 (keypad) or 9  -> GameBoy A Button: Action A
  • 2 (keypad) or 0  -> GameBoy B Button: Action B
  • Space  -> GameBoy Start: Select game in main menu. Exit game while in game
  • Enter  -> GameBoy Select: Change palette of the game
Controls Second Player (only in Pong):
  • WASD  -> GameBoy D-Pad: Move
  • 1  -> GameBoy A Button: Action A
  • 2 -> GameBoy B Button: Action B
  • Tab  -> GameBoy Start: Select game in main menu. Exit game while in game
  • Escape  -> GameBoy Select: Change palette of the game

Controllers not tested but should work.

A game made by Jules Gatelier (and a little help from Semerity) with:

  • Godot Engine
  • Paint.net
    • Palettes:
      • Original GameBoy palette
      • GameBoy color Palette by 3xtraCrunchy
      • Rustic GB Palette by Kerrie Lake
      • SpaceHaze Palette by WildLeoKnight

Didn't have time for any music nor sound effects...

I wanted to make a Tetris and a Snake but it didn't work and I couldn't make it work in time...

More games and music coming soon!
